"Ava Silva is a character on Netflix's Warrior Nun. She is portrayed by Alba Baptista.

"
"She is tasting freedom for the first time in her young life after being liberated from " "an abusive orphanage and a prison of her mind and body. As a result, she wants to " "experience everything at once, and she can be reckless in her ambition.

"
"History
" "Ava was a quadriplegia for twelve years, she was orphaned at the age of 7 when her mother " "died in a car accident she was in too, nothing is revealed about her father other than " "“he is not in the picture” and they didn't have any family in Spain, where she and her " "mother were on holiday. She was taken in by St. Michael Orphanage where it is shown in " "various flashbacks that she was mentally and verbally abused by Sister Frances.

"
"According Ava's file given by Sister Frances Ava committed suicide due to overdosing " "on painkillers, however, it is later revealed nearing the end of episode 4 that she " "was overdosed to death by Sister Frances who took care of her.

"
"During the first episode, A sister places the Halo artifact inside the corpse of " "19-year-old Ava to keep it protected. The holy relic resurrects Ava, and provides " "her with the abilities.

"

"Shotgun Mary is a character on Netflix's Warrior Nun. She is portrayed by Toya Turner.

"
"She is a woman loyal to the sisterhood more than the Church. She escaped family tragedy " "and was raised with religion but never really took to it fully. Naturally, she has a chip " "on her shoulder about loyalty. All the nuns know they can. count on Mary to have their " "backs.

"
"History
" "Shotgun Mary revealed in Episode Isaiah 30:20-21 that her mother was in prison, serving " "a life sentence for murdering her abusive husband. She later finds the OCS, and she felt " "that it was her family. She was not a nun, also she did not take an oath to be a nun. " "At least she could be loyal not to her religion, but to Father Vincent.

"

"Sister Lilith is a character on Netflix's Warrior Nun. She is portrayed by Lorena Andrea.

"
"She is born into an elite family, she is a legacy Nun and committed to her beliefs, " "which causes her to overstep and over-reach in her entitlement. 

"
"History
" "It's been known that her family has been serving the church for five generations as the " "Halo bearer.

"

"Sister Beatrice is a character on Netflix's Warrior Nun. She is portrayed by Kristina Tonteri-Young.

"
"She is a woman with a quiet Zen strength, Beatrice is a powerful Sister Warrior in her " "own right. The team’s resident strategist, Beatrice uses her reserved and intuitive " "nature to analyze everyone and everything around her.

"

"Sister Camila is a character on Netflix's Warrior Nun. She is portrayed by Olivia Delcán.

"
"Little is known of Camila however, she is a fierce fighter.

"
